conversations.conversation: I wrote a song called ";Ellen Degeneres";. I encourage all of you to visit YouTube.com, enter in Brandon Paul Webb, create a FREE account, and post respectful comments on my song about Ellen Degeneres; thank you very much!!

Google and YouTube my name, Brandon Paul Webb. I sing and play guitar..

I'm a former radio DJ from 89.7 fm KACC ";The Gulf Coast Rocker"; www.kaccradio.com and I auditioned for American Idol in 2008...

I am also a published author [Publish America released ";Pain Has Made Me Strong"; in 2005 and Xlibris released ";A Light Within Us All"; and ";Apple Gone Sour"; in 2010; Xlibris just released ";IN DUE TIME"; last year in 2011 and Xlibris is in the process of releasing my 5th book entitled ";Oatmeal"; this year/ 2012]; you can purchase all of my poetry books online at Amazon.com, thank you....

I encourage all of you to create a FREE account on YouTube.com, enter in Brandon Paul Webb, and post respectful comments on my video clips/ songs (thanks again)!!! Sincerely,

-Brandon Paul Webb
